dmca.title: DMCA Complaint from Purple Math
dmca.body:
Purple Math
P.O. Box 8584
Mesa AZ 58214-8584

01 September, 2006

Google, Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Comlaints
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043-1351

Dear Google Legal Support,

It has come to our attention that certain copyrighted content, created by Elizabeth Stapel for Purplemath.com, appears to have been posted to your servers. In accordance with your stated DMCA policy, as was posted to http://www.google.com/notebook_dmca.html as of 30 August 2006, you are being provided with the following information:

1) The identity of the work being infringed:

i) http://purplemath.com/modules/solvquad.html --
everything to the right of the tan-colored navigation bar, between the first example beginning with the text "Solve (x-3)(x-4)=0." and the links at the bottom of the page, including all of the graphics

ii) http://purplemath.com/modules/factquad.htm --
the text and graphics to the right of the tan-colored navigation bar, between the first horizontal bar and the links at the bottom, including: the first paragraph; the first example; the second paragraph and graphic after the first example; the second example; and the indented "Notes" after the second example.

iii) http://pruplemath.com/modules/factquad2.htm --
the text and graphics of the first example on the page


2) identity of the infringing work:

(a) http://www.google.com/notebook/public/13067098667760957401/BDS001goQ_oSfmLoh

(b) the entire text (everything below the "More by N1029676" header link and above the Google footer bar), excepting only the section headers, the right-hand navigation bar, and the links to the locations of original content; and all graphic "hotlinks"

3) Contact information of copyrgiht-holder:

Elizabeth Stapel
2944 East Edgewood Avenue
Mesa AZ 85204-4705

Elizabeth Stapel
P.O. Box 8584
Mesa AZ 85214-8584

4) Contact information of Google client
profile page: http://www.google.com/notebook/user/13067098667760957401

No further information appears to be publicly available regarding your client "N1029676".

5) "I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law."

6) I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed."

The Purplemath "Terms of Use" may be viewed at http://www.purplemath.com/terms.htm

The current Copyright Registration Certificate numbers are TX 5-725-275, TX 5-804-898, and TX 5-956-884 (copies available upon request); statutory damages may apply.

Please take appropriate action in this matter. Thank you.

Sincerely,
[signed]
Elizabeth Stapel
Purplemath.com

enclosures: copy of infringement, samples of original content
